algorithm_technique: Iterative generation of the sequence by applying run-length encoding to the previous term.
problem_summary_simple: Generate the nth term of the count-and-say sequence by describing the previous term.
problem_summary_technical: Iteratively builds the sequence by performing run-length encoding on the previous string representation.
key_insights: The sequence grows exponentially in length.
Each term is generated by scanning the previous term and counting consecutive identical characters.
The base case `countAndSay(1) = "1"` is crucial for the iteration.
